bike.description: Full high modulus carbon, Omniad Elite M30 lay-up, 130mm travel mp4 suspension, Press Fit 30 bottom bracket, 12 x 142 rear dropouts, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, dropper post routing, high direct mount front derailleur, asymmetrical chainstays, stainless steel chain stay protector, cartridge bearing pivots, Rock Shox Monarch RT3 High Volume w/ 3-position compression (open/platform/lock), 10mm hardware, replaceable derailleur hanger, Rock Shox Maxle Lite axle

components.description: Rock Shox Revelation 650B RCT3 w/ 3-position compression adjust (open/platform/lock), 15mm axle, tapered alloy steerer, external rebound adjust, 130mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
StanJAMIS_SINGLEQUOTEs NoTubes ZTR Arch EX 650B tubeless wheels, 3.30 Series 15mm axle front and 12x142mm rear hubs, DT Swiss Competition spokes
SRAM XO Type 2 rear and XO HDM front
Avid XO hydraulic disc brakes with 180mm front and 160mm rear HS1 rotors
Crank Brothers Iodine 2, 720mm x 30mm rise, 6JAMIS_DEGREE sweep
